title.native: 月が導く異世界道中 第二幕
title.romaji: Tsuki ga Michibiku Isekai Douchuu 2nd Season

description:
The second season of Tsuki ga Michibiku Isekai Douchuu.

After Makoto Misumi defeats Mitsurugi and Sofia Bulga, humanity is saved from the attacking demon army—for the time being. The goddess is aware of Makoto’s growing power, and she sees him as less of a nuisance and more of a rival. Makoto continues his journey to further expand his community of outcasts and connect with more hyumans. But will he be strong enough to hold off the coming storm?

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: จันทรานำพาสู่ต่างโลก ภาค 2
月光下的異世界之旅 第二季
Благословлённое лунным светом приключение в другом мире 2

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Medieval
tags.description: Partially or completely set in the Middle Ages or a Middle Ages-inspired setting. Commonly features elements such as European castles and knights.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Language Barrier
tags.description: A barrier to communication between people who are unable to speak a common language.

tags.name: Economics
tags.description: Centers around the field of economics.

tags.name: Gods
tags.description: Prominently features a character of divine or religious nature.

tags.name: Monster Girl
tags.description: Prominently features a female character who is part-monster.

tags.name: Teacher
tags.description: Protagonist is an educator, usually in a school setting.

tags.name: Demons
tags.description: Prominently features malevolent otherworldly creatures.

tags.name: Revenge
tags.description: Prominently features a character who aims to exact punishment in a resentful or vindictive manner.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

tags.name: Anthropomorphism
tags.description: Contains non-human character(s) that have attributes or characteristics of a human being.

tags.name: Meta
tags.description: Features fourth wall-breaking references to itself or genre tropes.

tags.name: Samurai
tags.description: Prominently features warriors of medieval Japanese nobility bound by a code of honor.

tags.name: Archery
tags.description: Centers around the sport of archery, or prominently features the use of archery in combat.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Body Horror
tags.description: Features characters who undergo horrific transformations or disfigurement, often to their own detriment.

tags.name: Achronological Order
tags.description: Chapters or episodes do not occur in chronological order.

tags.name: Rape
tags.description: Features non-consensual sexual penetration.

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/dmpmutation)

**Shinji Ishihira** is a Japanese director, episode director and storyboard artist.
Previously working at Tavac, now for Real-T.
Shouji Hata is an Audio Engineer.

[Profile](https://www.81produce.co.jp/actor_search/index.php/item?id=9) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/2403isn) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/21s_ken) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/kent_110_va/) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/1bPpm1gD9bX3hXCYaORYlw?autoplay=true)

**Non-Anime Roles**:
• Dan Heng (Honkai: Star Rail)
• Toya Aoyagi (Project Sekai: Colorful Stage! feat. Hatsune Miku)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/dmpmutation)

**Shinji Ishihira** is a Japanese director, episode director and storyboard artist.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/jumpaoki) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/62166972)

Affiliated with [J.C. Staff](https://anilist.co/studio/7/), where he is one of the studio's leading animators. He is currently the leader of the action animation department at J.C. Staff.
